part1000.publication_index.name: CR_210_1
part1000.publication_index.wg.number.publication_set_comments: item shape support (CR 1/2) for ap242 ed2
part1000.publication_index.description: For AP242 Ed2 - AP210's modules change request number 1/2. The application modules that are to be added to Part1000 as part of change request CR_210_1. The STEPmod CVS repository should be tagged as: CR_210_1 before submitting the change request.
